extension.name: RD-Media Free Checkout
extension.author: Robert Dam
extension.description: Free Checkout Processor for RD-Media for Ticketmaster version 2.5.0 or higher. Note this one works only when the checkout has a value of 0.00

field.name: infobox
field.description: Give information for your payment.(This will be shown in the paymentbox)
field.label: Message for Customer

field.name: j3buttontext
field.description: When using Joomla 3 or Bootstrapped Joomla 2.5, please provide us the text for the button. (needs to be a short texture)
field.label: Joomla3 Button Text

field.name: layout
field.description: If you have Twitter Bootstrap enabled in the Ticketmaster Configuration or you are running Joomla 3 you may set this value to Vertical View.
field.label: Plugin Layout

field.name: email_tpl
field.description: This is e the email that will be send on success. Note, this email doesn't contain the tickets, it's only a message of the successfull order.
field.label: Success Email

field.name: success_tpl
field.description: Message to be shown on success, this is a page. Please get the EID from the messagecenter. The message and subject will be shown in the screen.
field.label: Successfull Page
